links.quantification: Early warning → behavioral adaptation (reduce outdoor work) → heat exposure -40% → productivity loss avoided ₹8K Cr/year

Funding gap: Heat plans need ₹5K Cr; municipal budgets insufficient → central/state support required → 3-year financing delay
Tree planting → urban canopy +20% → neighborhood cooling → heat stress declines → green space demand grows (reinforcing)
Requires hydration infrastructure: Heat plans only effective with 1000 public water points → ₹500 Cr drinking fountain network prerequisite
Via UHI reduction: Tree cover → 3°C cooling → heat-sensitive species survival improves → urban biodiversity +15%
Via peak reduction: Cooling centers → grid stability → power outages -30% during heat waves → community resilience
Via thermal design: Cool roofs on 500 centers → passive cooling → AC load -50% → ₹500 Cr energy savings
Via evapotranspiration: Trees → humidity increases → ozone formation -10% → air quality co-benefits
